mapper.select: select nt.nt_idx AS ntIdx, um.um_id AS userId, nt.nt_title AS ntTitle, nt.nt_date AS ntDate, ch.CH_IDX AS chIdx, ch.CH_INCREASE AS chIncrease, ch.CH_TITLE AS chTitle, ch.CH_TRAVELDATE AS chTravelDate from UserMember um inner join Note nt on um.um_id = nt.NT_UM_ID inner join Chapter ch on nt.NT_IDX = ch.CH_NT_IDX
mapper.insert: insert into dept (deptno, dname, loc) values ( #{deptno}, #{dname}, #{loc} )
